flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Often found innforests, eatingnleaves.fIt has a sharpnvenomous stingernon its head.
Often found innforests, eatingnleaves.fIt has a sharpnvenomous stingernon its head.
Beware of thensharp stinger onnits head. Itfhides in grassnand bushes wherenit eats leaves.
Its poison stingernis very powerful.nIts bright-coloredfbody is intendednto warn off itsnenemies.
It attacks using antwo-inch poisonnbarb on its head.fIt can usually benfound under thenleaves it eats.
The barb on top ofnits head secretesna strong poison.fIt uses this toxicnbarb to protectnitself.
WEEDLE has an extremely acute sensenof smell.nIt is capable of distinguishing itsffavorite kinds of leaves from those itndislikes just by sniffing with its bignred proboscis (nose).
WEEDLE has an extremely acute sensenof smell.nIt is capable of distinguishing itsffavorite kinds of leaves from those itndislikes just by sniffing with its bignred proboscis (nose).
A WEEDLE has an extremely acute sensenof smell. It distinguishes its favoritenkinds of leaves from those it dislikes bynsniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).
Often found in forests and grasslands.nIt has a sharp, toxic barb of around twoninches on top of its head.
Often found in forests, eating leaves.nIt has a sharp stinger on its head thatninjects poison.
It eats its weight in leaves everynday. It fends off attackers withnthe needle on its head.
It eats its weight in leaves everynday. It fends off attackers withnthe needle on its head.
It eats its weight in leaves everynday. It fends off attackers withnthe needle on its head.
Its poison stinger is very powerful.nIts bright-colored body is intendednto warn off its enemies.
It attacks using a two-inch poisonnbarb on its head. It can usually benfound under the leaves it eats.
Il mange chaque jour son poids ennfeuilles. Il utilise l’aiguillon sur santête pour repousser l’ennemi.
It eats its weight in leaves everynday. It fends off attackers withnthe needle on its head.
Il mange chaque jour son poids ennfeuilles. Il utilise l’aiguillon sur santête pour repousser l’ennemi.
头上长有尖锐的针。n它喜欢藏在森林或n草丛里大量吞食树叶。
It eats its weight in leaves everynday. It fends off attackers withnthe needle on its head.
It eats its weight in leaves everynday. It fends off attackers withnthe needle on its head.
It eats its weight in leaves everynday. It fends off attackers withnthe needle on its head.
もりや　くさちに　おおく　せいそく。nあたまの　さきに　５センチぐらいのnちいさく　するどい　どくばりをもつ。
숲이나 풀밭에 많이 서식한다.n머리끝에 5cm 정도의n작고 날카로운 독침을 지니고 있다.
On trouve souvent ce Pokémon dans les forêts etnles hautes herbes. L’aiguillon de 5 cm sur sa têtencontient un venin très toxique.
Es lebt bevorzugt in Wäldern und in hohem Gras.nAuf dem Kopf trägt es einen circa 5 cm langen,nspitzen, giftigen Stachel.
Suele habitar bosques y praderas. Tiene un afilado ynvenenoso aguijón de unos 5 cm encima de la cabeza.
Vive soprattutto nei boschi e nei prati. Sul capo hanun affilato e velenoso pungiglione lungo 5 cm.
Often found in forests and grasslands.nIt has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inchesnon top of its head.
森や　草地に　多く　生息。n頭の　先に　５センチぐらいのn小さく　鋭い　毒針を持つ。
どくばりは　とても　きょうりょく。nめだつ　からだの　いろはnあいてに　けいかいを　させるためだ。
독침이 매우 강력하다.n눈에 띄는 몸의 색깔은n상대방을 경계시키기 위해서다.
Son aiguillon empoisonné est très dangereux.nSon corps est coloré afin de repousser ses ennemis.
Sein Giftstachel ist gefährlich. Sein hellleuchtendernKörper soll Feinde abschrecken.
Su venenoso aguijón es muy potente y su coloridoncuerpo hace que los enemigos huyan.
Ha un pungiglione molto velenoso. La vivacencolorazione del suo corpo è un avvertimento per innemici.
Its poison stinger is very powerful.nIts bright-colored body is intended tonwarn off its enemies.
毒針は　とても　強力。n目立つ　体の　色はn相手に　警戒を　させるためだ。
とても　するどい　きゅうかくを　もっている。nこうぶつの　はっぱか　きらいな　はっぱかnおおきな　あかい　はなで　かぎわける。
굉장히 예민한 후각을 지니고 있다.n좋아하는 잎사귀인지 싫어하는 잎사귀인지n크고 빨간 코로 냄새 맡아 구별한다.
L’odorat d’Aspicot est extrêmement développé. Il lui suffit denrenifler ses feuilles préférées avec son gros appendice nasalnpour les reconnaître entre mille.
Hornliu verfügt über einen ausgezeichneten Geruchssinn.nSo kann es seine Lieblingsblätter von denen unterscheiden,ndie es nicht mag, indem es mit seiner großen roten Nasendaran schnuppert.
Weedle tiene un finísimo sentido del olfato. Es capaz dendistinguir las hojas que le gustan de las que no le gustannolisqueando un poco con la gran nariz que tiene.
Weedle ha un senso dell’olfatto estremamente sviluppato.nRiesce a distinguere le sue foglie preferite da quelle chenlo disgustano semplicemente annusandole con il grandennaso rosso.
Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capable ofndistinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikesnjust by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).
とても　鋭い　嗅覚を　持っている。n好物の　葉っぱか　嫌いな　葉っぱかn大きな　赤い　鼻で　嗅ぎ分ける。
とても　するどい　きゅうかくを　もっている。nこうぶつの　はっぱか　きらいな　はっぱかnおおきな　あかい　はなで　かぎわける。
굉장히 예민한 후각을 지니고 있다.n좋아하는 잎사귀인지 싫어하는 잎사귀인지n크고 빨간 코로 냄새 맡아 구별한다.
L’odorat d’Aspicot est extrêmement développé. Il lui suffit denrenifler ses feuilles préférées avec son gros appendice nasalnpour les reconnaître entre mille.

Hornliu verfügt über einen ausgezeichneten Geruchssinn.nEs ist in der Lage, seine Lieblingsblätter von denen zununterscheiden, die es nicht mag, indem es mit seinem großennroten Rüssel daran schnuppert.
Weedle tiene un finísimo sentido del olfato. Es capaz dendistinguir las hojas que le gustan de las que no le gustannolisqueando un poco con la gran nariz que tiene.
Weedle ha un senso dell’olfatto estremamente sviluppato.nRiesce a distinguere le sue foglie preferite da quelle chenlo disgustano semplicemente annusandole con il grandennaso rosso.
Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It is capablenof distinguishing its favorite kinds of leaves from those itndislikes just by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).
とても　鋭い　嗅覚を　持っている。n好物の　葉っぱか　嫌いな　葉っぱかn大きな　赤い　鼻で　嗅ぎ分ける。
あたまに　するどい　ハリを　もつ。nもりや　くさちの　しげみに　かくれnひたすら　ハッパを　たべている。
머리에 날카로운 침을 지니고 있다.n우거진 숲이나 풀밭에 숨어n끊임없이 풀잎을 먹고 있다.
頭上長著尖銳的針。n總是躲在森林或是草叢裡，n不停地吃著葉子。
L’aiguillon sur son front est très pointu.nIl se cache dans les bois et les hautes herbes,noù il se gave de feuilles.
Auf seinem Kopf befindet sich ein spitzernStachel. Es versteckt sich im hohen Grasnsowie in Wäldern und frisst eifrig Blätter.
El aguijón de la cabeza es muy puntiagudo.nSe alimenta de hojas oculto en la espesurande bosques y praderas.
Ha un pungiglione acuminato sul capo. Vive tranl’erba alta e nei boschi, dove si nutre di foglie.
Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hidesnin grass and bushes where it eats leaves.
頭に　鋭い　ハリを　もつ。n森や　草地の　茂みに　隠れnひたすら　ハッパを　食べている。
あたまに　するどい　ハリを　もつ。nもりや　くさちの　しげみに　かくれnひたすら　ハッパを　たべている。
